00058 typedef orxU32                      orxRGBA;
00059 
00060 #ifdef __orxBIG_ENDIAN__
00061 
00062   #define orx2RGBA(R, G, B, A)      ((((R) & 0xFF) << 24) | (((G) & 0xFF) << 16) | (((B) & 0xFF) << 8) | ((A) & 0xFF))
00063   #define orxRGBA_R(RGBA)           (orxU8)(((RGBA) >> 24) & 0xFF)
00064   #define orxRGBA_G(RGBA)           (orxU8)(((RGBA) >> 16) & 0xFF)
00065   #define orxRGBA_B(RGBA)           (orxU8)(((RGBA) >> 8) & 0xFF)
00066   #define orxRGBA_A(RGBA)           (orxU8)((RGBA) & 0xFF)
00067 
00068 #else /* __orxBIG_ENDIAN__ */
00069 
00070   #define orx2RGBA(R, G, B, A)      ((((A) & 0xFF) << 24) | (((B) & 0xFF) << 16) | (((G) & 0xFF) << 8) | ((R) & 0xFF))
00071   #define orxRGBA_R(RGBA)           (orxU8)((RGBA) & 0xFF)
00072   #define orxRGBA_G(RGBA)           (orxU8)(((RGBA) >> 8) & 0xFF)
00073   #define orxRGBA_B(RGBA)           (orxU8)(((RGBA) >> 16) & 0xFF)
00074   #define orxRGBA_A(RGBA)           (orxU8)(((RGBA) >> 24) & 0xFF)
00075 
00076 #endif /* __orxBIG_ENDIAN__ */
00077 
00078 #define orxCOLOR_NORMALIZER         (orx2F(1.0f / 255.0f))
00079 #define orxCOLOR_DENORMALIZER       (orx2F(255.0f))

00261 static orxINLINE orxCOLOR *       orxColor_SetRGBA(orxCOLOR *_pstColor, orxRGBA _stRGBA)
00262 {
00263   orxCOLOR *pstResult = _pstColor;
00264 
00265   /* Checks */
00266   orxASSERT(_pstColor != orxNULL);
00267 
00268   /* Stores RGB */
00269   orxVector_Set(&(_pstColor->vRGB), orxCOLOR_NORMALIZER * orxU2F(orxRGBA_R(_stRGBA)), orxCOLOR_NORMALIZER * orxU2F(orxRGBA_G(_stRGBA)), orxCOLOR_NORMALIZER * orxU2F(orxRGBA_B(_stRGBA)));
00270 
00271   /* Stores alpha */
00272   _pstColor->fAlpha = orxCOLOR_NORMALIZER * orxRGBA_A(_stRGBA);
00273 
00274   /* Done! */
00275   return pstResult;
00276 }
00277 
00284 static orxINLINE orxCOLOR *       orxColor_Set(orxCOLOR *_pstColor, const orxVECTOR *_pvRGB, orxFLOAT _fAlpha)
00285 {
00286   orxCOLOR *pstResult = _pstColor;
00287 
00288   /* Checks */
00289   orxASSERT(_pstColor != orxNULL);
00290 
00291   /* Stores RGB */
00292   orxVector_Copy(&(_pstColor->vRGB), _pvRGB);
00293 
00294   /* Stores alpha */
00295   _pstColor->fAlpha = _fAlpha;
00296 
00297   /* Done! */
00298   return pstResult;
00299 }

00306 static orxINLINE orxCOLOR *       orxColor_SetRGB(orxCOLOR *_pstColor, const orxVECTOR *_pvRGB)
00307 {
00308   orxCOLOR *pstResult = _pstColor;
00309 
00310   /* Checks */
00311   orxASSERT(_pstColor != orxNULL);
00312   orxASSERT(_pvRGB != orxNULL);
00313 
00314   /* Stores components */
00315   orxVector_Copy(&(_pstColor->vRGB), _pvRGB);
00316 
00317   /* Done! */
00318   return pstResult;

00328   orxCOLOR *pstResult = _pstColor;

00330   /* Checks */
00331   orxASSERT(_pstColor != orxNULL);

00333   /* Stores it */

00339 
00344 static orxINLINE orxRGBA          orxColor_ToRGBA(const orxCOLOR *_pstColor)
00345 {
00346   orxRGBA   stResult;
00347   orxVECTOR vColor;
00348   orxFLOAT  fAlpha;
00349 
00350   /* Checks */
00351   orxASSERT(_pstColor != orxNULL);
00352 
00353   /* Clamps RGB components */
00354   orxVector_Clamp(&vColor, &(_pstColor->vRGB), &orxVECTOR_0, &orxVECTOR_WHITE);
00355 
00356   /* De-normalizes vector */
00357   orxVector_Mulf(&vColor, &vColor, orxCOLOR_DENORMALIZER);
00358 
00359   /* Clamps alpha */
00360   fAlpha = orxCLAMP(_pstColor->fAlpha, orxFLOAT_0, orxFLOAT_1);
00361 
00362   /* Updates result */
00363   stResult = orx2RGBA(orxF2U(vColor.fR), orxF2U(vColor.fG), orxF2U(vColor.fB), orxF2U(orxCOLOR_DENORMALIZER * fAlpha));
00364 
00365   /* Done! */
00366   return stResult;
00367 }
00368 
00374 static orxINLINE orxCOLOR *       orxColor_Copy(orxCOLOR *_pstDst, const orxCOLOR *_pstSrc)
00375 {
00376   /* Checks */
00377   orxASSERT(_pstDst != orxNULL);
00378   orxASSERT(_pstSrc != orxNULL);
00379 
00380   /* Copies it */
00381   orxMemory_Copy(_pstDst, _pstSrc, sizeof(orxCOLOR));
00382 
00383   /* Done! */
00384   return _pstDst;
00385 }

00392 static orxCOLOR *orxFASTCALL      orxColor_FromRGBToHSL(orxCOLOR *_pstDst, const orxCOLOR *_pstSrc)
00393 {
00394   orxCOLOR *pstResult = _pstDst;
00395   orxFLOAT  fMin, fMax, fDelta, fR, fG, fB;
00396 
00397   /* Checks */
00398   orxASSERT(_pstDst != orxNULL);
00399   orxASSERT(_pstSrc != orxNULL);
00400 
00401   /* Gets source red, blue and green components */
00402   fR = _pstSrc->vRGB.fR;
00403   fG = _pstSrc->vRGB.fG;
00404   fB = _pstSrc->vRGB.fB;
00405 
00406   /* Gets min, max & delta values */
00407   fMin    = orxMIN(fR, orxMIN(fG, fB));
00408   fMax    = orxMAX(fR, orxMAX(fG, fB));
00409   fDelta  = fMax - fMin;
00410 
00411   /* Stores lightness */
00412   pstResult->vHSL.fL = orx2F(0.5f) * (fMax + fMin);
00413 
00414   /* Gray? */
00415   if(fDelta == orxFLOAT_0)
00416   {
00417     /* Gets hue & saturation */
00418     pstResult->vHSL.fH = pstResult->vHSL.fS = orxFLOAT_0;
00419   }
00420   else
00421   {
00422     /* Updates saturation */
00423     pstResult->vHSL.fS = (pstResult->vHSL.fL < orx2F(0.5f))
00424                        ? fDelta / (fMax + fMin)
00425                        : fDelta / (orx2F(2.0f) - fMax - fMin);
00426 
00427     /* Red tone? */
00428     if(fR == fMax)
00429     {
00430       /* Updates hue */
00431       pstResult->vHSL.fH = orx2F(1.0f / 6.0f) * (fG - fB) / fDelta;
00432     }
00433     /* Green tone? */
00434     else if(fG == fMax)
00435     {
00436       /* Updates hue */
00437       pstResult->vHSL.fH = orx2F(1.0f / 3.0f) + (orx2F(1.0f / 6.0f) * (fB - fR) / fDelta);
00438     }
00439     /* Blue tone */
00440     else
00441     {
00442       /* Updates hue */
00443       pstResult->vHSL.fH = orx2F(2.0f / 3.0f) + (orx2F(1.0f / 6.0f) * (fR - fG) / fDelta);
00444     }
00445 
00446     /* Clamps hue */
00447     if(pstResult->vHSL.fH < orxFLOAT_0)
00448     {
00449       pstResult->vHSL.fH += orxFLOAT_1;
00450     }
00451     else if(pstResult->vHSL.fH > orxFLOAT_1)
00452     {
00453       pstResult->vHSL.fH -= orxFLOAT_1;
00454     }
00455   }
00456 
00457   /* Updates alpha */
00458   pstResult->fAlpha = _pstSrc->fAlpha;
00459 
00460   /* Done! */
00461   return pstResult;
00462 }
00463 
00469 static orxCOLOR *orxFASTCALL      orxColor_FromHSLToRGB(orxCOLOR *_pstDst, const orxCOLOR *_pstSrc)
00470 {
00471   orxCOLOR *pstResult = _pstDst;
00472   orxFLOAT  fH, fS, fL;
00473 
00474 #define orxCOLOR_GET_RGB_COMPONENT(RESULT, ALT, CHROMA, HUE)                      \
00475 do                                                                                \
00476 {                                                                                 \
00477   if(HUE < orx2F(1.0f / 6.0f))                                                    \
00478   {                                                                               \
00479     RESULT = ALT + (orx2F(6.0f) * HUE * (CHROMA - ALT));                          \
00480   }                                                                               \
00481   else if(HUE < orx2F(1.0f / 2.0f))                                               \
00482   {                                                                               \
00483     RESULT = CHROMA;                                                              \
00484   }                                                                               \
00485   else if(HUE < orx2F(2.0f / 3.0f))                                               \
00486   {                                                                               \
00487     RESULT = ALT + (orx2F(6.0f) * (CHROMA - ALT) * (orx2F(2.0f / 3.0f) - HUE));   \
00488   }                                                                               \
00489   else                                                                            \
00490   {                                                                               \
00491     RESULT = ALT;                                                                 \
00492   }                                                                               \
00493   if(RESULT < orxMATH_KF_EPSILON)                                                 \
00494   {                                                                               \
00495     RESULT = orxFLOAT_0;                                                          \
00496   }                                                                               \
00497   else if(RESULT > orxFLOAT_1 - orxMATH_KF_EPSILON)                               \
00498   {                                                                               \
00499     RESULT = orxFLOAT_1;                                                          \
00500   }                                                                               \
00501 }                                                                                 \
00502 while(orxFALSE)
00503 
00504   /* Checks */
00505   orxASSERT(_pstDst != orxNULL);
00506   orxASSERT(_pstSrc != orxNULL);
00507 
00508   /* Gets source hue, saturation and lightness components */
00509   fH = _pstSrc->vRGB.fH;
00510   fS = _pstSrc->vRGB.fS;
00511   fL = _pstSrc->vRGB.fL;
00512 
00513   /* Gray? */
00514   if(fS == orxFLOAT_0)
00515   {
00516     /* Updates result */
00517     orxVector_SetAll(&(pstResult->vRGB), fL);
00518   }
00519   else
00520   {
00521     orxFLOAT fChroma, fIntermediate;
00522 
00523     /* Gets chroma */
00524     fChroma = (fL < orx2F(0.5f))
00525             ? fL + (fL * fS)
00526             : fL + fS - (fL * fS);
00527 
00528     /* Gets intermediate value */
00529     fIntermediate = (orx2F(2.0f) * fL) - fChroma;
00530 
00531     /* Gets RGB components */
00532     if(fH > orx2F(2.0f / 3.0f))
00533     {
00534       orxCOLOR_GET_RGB_COMPONENT(pstResult->vRGB.fR, fIntermediate, fChroma, (fH - orx2F(2.0f / 3.0f)));
00535     }
00536     else
00537     {
00538       orxCOLOR_GET_RGB_COMPONENT(pstResult->vRGB.fR, fIntermediate, fChroma, (fH + orx2F(1.0f / 3.0f)));
00539     }
00540     orxCOLOR_GET_RGB_COMPONENT(pstResult->vRGB.fG, fIntermediate, fChroma, fH);
00541     if(fH < orx2F(1.0f / 3.0f))
00542     {
00543       orxCOLOR_GET_RGB_COMPONENT(pstResult->vRGB.fB, fIntermediate, fChroma, (fH + orx2F(2.0f / 3.0f)));
00544     }
00545     else
00546     {
00547       orxCOLOR_GET_RGB_COMPONENT(pstResult->vRGB.fB, fIntermediate, fChroma, (fH - orx2F(1.0f / 3.0f)));
00548     }
00549   }
00550 
00551   /* Updates alpha */
00552   pstResult->fAlpha = _pstSrc->fAlpha;
00553 
00554   /* Done! */
00555   return pstResult;
00556 }
00557 
00563 static orxCOLOR *orxFASTCALL      orxColor_FromRGBToHSV(orxCOLOR *_pstDst, const orxCOLOR *_pstSrc)
00564 {
00565   orxCOLOR *pstResult = _pstDst;
00566   orxFLOAT  fMin, fMax, fDelta, fR, fG, fB;
00567 
00568   /* Checks */
00569   orxASSERT(_pstDst != orxNULL);
00570   orxASSERT(_pstSrc != orxNULL);
00571 
00572   /* Gets source red, blue and green components */
00573   fR = _pstSrc->vRGB.fR;
00574   fG = _pstSrc->vRGB.fG;
00575   fB = _pstSrc->vRGB.fB;
00576 
00577   /* Gets min, max & delta values */
00578   fMin    = orxMIN(fR, orxMIN(fG, fB));
00579   fMax    = orxMAX(fR, orxMAX(fG, fB));
00580   fDelta  = fMax - fMin;
00581 
00582   /* Stores value */
00583   pstResult->vHSL.fV = fMax;
00584 
00585   /* Gray? */
00586   if(fDelta == orxFLOAT_0)
00587   {
00588     /* Gets hue & saturation */
00589     pstResult->vHSL.fH = pstResult->vHSL.fS = orxFLOAT_0;
00590   }
00591   else
00592   {
00593     /* Updates saturation */
00594     pstResult->vHSL.fS = fDelta / fMax;
00595 
00596     /* Red tone? */
00597     if(fR == fMax)
00598     {
00599       /* Updates hue */
00600       pstResult->vHSL.fH = orx2F(1.0f / 6.0f) * (fG - fB) / fDelta;
00601     }
00602     /* Green tone? */
00603     else if(fG == fMax)
00604     {
00605       /* Updates hue */
00606       pstResult->vHSL.fH = orx2F(1.0f / 3.0f) + (orx2F(1.0f / 6.0f) * (fB - fR) / fDelta);
00607     }
00608     /* Blue tone */
00609     else
00610     {
00611       /* Updates hue */
00612       pstResult->vHSL.fH = orx2F(2.0f / 3.0f) + (orx2F(1.0f / 6.0f) * (fR - fG) / fDelta);
00613     }
00614 
00615     /* Clamps hue */
00616     if(pstResult->vHSL.fH < orxFLOAT_0)
00617     {
00618       pstResult->vHSL.fH += orxFLOAT_1;
00619     }
00620     else if(pstResult->vHSL.fH > orxFLOAT_1)
00621     {
00622       pstResult->vHSL.fH -= orxFLOAT_1;
00623     }
00624   }
00625 
00626   /* Updates alpha */
00627   pstResult->fAlpha = _pstSrc->fAlpha;
00628 
00629   /* Done! */
00630   return pstResult;
00631 }
00632 
00638 static orxCOLOR *orxFASTCALL      orxColor_FromHSVToRGB(orxCOLOR *_pstDst, const orxCOLOR *_pstSrc)
00639 {
00640   orxCOLOR *pstResult = _pstDst;
00641   orxFLOAT  fH, fS, fV;
00642 
00643   /* Checks */
00644   orxASSERT(_pstDst != orxNULL);
00645   orxASSERT(_pstSrc != orxNULL);
00646 
00647   /* Gets source hue, saturation and value components */
00648   fH = _pstSrc->vRGB.fH;
00649   fS = _pstSrc->vRGB.fS;
00650   fV = _pstSrc->vRGB.fV;
00651 
00652   /* Gray? */
00653   if(fS == orxFLOAT_0)
00654   {
00655     /* Updates result */
00656     orxVector_SetAll(&(pstResult->vRGB), fV);
00657   }
00658   else
00659   {
00660     orxFLOAT fFullHue, fSector, fIntermediate;
00661 
00662     /* Gets intermediate value */
00663     fIntermediate = fV * fS;
00664 
00665     /* Gets full hue & sector */
00666     fFullHue  = orx2F(6.0f) * fH;
00667     fSector   = orxMath_Floor(fFullHue);
00668 
00669     /* Depending on sector */
00670     switch(orxF2U(fSector))
00671     {
00672       default:
00673       case 0:
00674       {
00675         /* Updates RGB components */
00676         pstResult->vRGB.fR = fV;
00677         pstResult->vRGB.fG = fV - (fIntermediate - (fIntermediate * (fFullHue - fSector)));
00678         pstResult->vRGB.fB = fV - fIntermediate;
00679 
00680         break;
00681       }
00682 
00683       case 1:
00684       {
00685         /* Updates RGB components */
00686         pstResult->vRGB.fR = fV - (fIntermediate * (fFullHue - fSector));
00687         pstResult->vRGB.fG = fV;
00688         pstResult->vRGB.fB = fV - fIntermediate;
00689 
00690         break;
00691       }
00692 
00693       case 2:
00694       {
00695         /* Updates RGB components */
00696         pstResult->vRGB.fR = fV - fIntermediate;
00697         pstResult->vRGB.fG = fV;
00698         pstResult->vRGB.fB = fV - (fIntermediate - (fIntermediate * (fFullHue - fSector)));
00699 
00700         break;
00701       }
00702 
00703       case 3:
00704       {
00705         /* Updates RGB components */
00706         pstResult->vRGB.fR = fV - fIntermediate;
00707         pstResult->vRGB.fG = fV - (fIntermediate * (fFullHue - fSector));
00708         pstResult->vRGB.fB = fV;
00709 
00710         break;
00711       }
00712 
00713       case 4:
00714       {
00715         /* Updates RGB components */
00716         pstResult->vRGB.fR = fV - (fIntermediate - (fIntermediate * (fFullHue - fSector)));
00717         pstResult->vRGB.fG = fV - fIntermediate;
00718         pstResult->vRGB.fB = fV;
00719 
00720         break;
00721       }
00722 
00723       case 5:
00724       {
00725         /* Updates RGB components */
00726         pstResult->vRGB.fR = fV;
00727         pstResult->vRGB.fG = fV - fIntermediate;
00728         pstResult->vRGB.fB = fV - (fIntermediate * (fFullHue - fSector));
00729 
00730         break;
00731       }
00732     }
00733   }
00734 
00735   /* Updates alpha */
00736   pstResult->fAlpha = _pstSrc->fAlpha;
00737 
00738   /* Done! */
00739   return pstResult;
00740 }

00744  * Functions extended by plugins
00745  ***************************************************************************/
